purpose: Structured framework for evaluating potential new vertical opportunities

marketOpportunity.description: Assessment of the market size, growth, and accessibility

factors.name: Market Accessibility
factors.description: Ease of entry and customer acquisition
scoringGuidelines: 1: Highly restricted, regulated, or dominated market
3: Moderate barriers with clear entry strategy
5: Highly accessible with multiple entry points

factors.name: Customer Pain Point
factors.description: Severity and urgency of problem being solved

aiDisruptionPotential.description: Potential for AI to create significant value in this vertical

factors.name: Data Availability
factors.description: Accessibility and quality of data needed for AI
scoringGuidelines: 3: Moderate data availability with some integration challenges
4: Good data availability with clear access paths

factors.name: AI Value Creation
factors.description: Potential for AI to create significant value
scoringGuidelines: 5: Opportunity to fundamentally reinvent the vertical

factors.name: Technical Feasibility
factors.description: Current technical capability to deliver solution
scoringGuidelines: 5: Can leverage existing technology with minimal adaptation

strategicAlignment.description: Fit with KinOS Ventures strategy and capabilities

factors.name: Core Technology Leverage
factors.description: Ability to leverage KinOS Engine capabilities
scoringGuidelines: 2: Uses some aspects of core technology
4: Strong leverage of multiple core components
5: Ideal application of core technology strengths

factors.name: Cross-Vertical Synergies
scoringGuidelines: 1: No clear synergies with other verticals
5: Central to creating cross-vertical network effects

factors.name: Team Capability Fit
scoringGuidelines: 3: Some expertise exists with identifiable gaps
5: Strong team expertise already in place

executionRequirements.description: Resources and timeline needed for successful execution

factors.name: Resource Requirements
scoringGuidelines: 1: Requires significant resources beyond current capacity
3: Moderate resource needs within potential capacity
5: Minimal resources needed for initial validation

factors.name: Time to Market
factors.description: Expected timeline to initial product launch

factors.name: Regulatory Complexity
scoringGuidelines: 1: Highly regulated with complex approval processes

steps.name: Initial Screening
steps.description: Quick assessment against basic criteria to determine if full evaluation is warranted
steps.threshold: Minimum score of 3 on Market Size, AI Value Creation, and Core Technology Leverage

steps.name: Comprehensive Evaluation
steps.description: Full scoring of all criteria by cross-functional team

steps.name: Final Decision
steps.description: Go/No-Go decision with resource allocation if approved
steps.threshold: Weighted average score of 3.5+ for serious consideration
